tutorial:
Welcome to the Color Variant Generator!
Create a default palette by entering colors above.
Enter a variance to determine how much the colors should change.
A variance of 20-30 will create a small change,
   and a variance of 70-100 will create a significant change
Enter how many new palettes you'd like to generate
Enter color groups to make colors have the same changes,
   check the How to Use page for more information.
I hope you enjoy, have fun!
